entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When a variable initializer has incompatible type, the editor should offer to change the variable's type to match the expression type #70306
  • C# doesn't allow for methods with optional `System.Half` parameters #70300
  • Pressing enter key when creating switch expression forces variable and braces on 1 line #70294
    17.9
  • Edit history changes when renaming a symbol #70293
    17.9

Closed

  • EnC fails in method containing await foreach #69805
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve performance on SymbolCompletionProviderTests #70307
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add line continuation tests for string concatenation #70305
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support to the LSIF generator for document symbols #70304
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce scope of banned API suppressions to only what is necessary #70303
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Seeing what breaks. #70302
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Small bits of cleanup in sync'ing code. #70301
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove hello service #70298
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Replace Roslyn.Utilities.IReadOnlySet with System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlySet #70297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: For testing purposes only. #70296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preserve existing formatting when fully qualifying names #70295
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make a special CodeAnalysis diagnostics refresh request for Run Code Analysis command #70292
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged

Merged

  • [17.8] Collection expressions: merge changes for conversions and optimizations #70273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70308
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Warn if collection expression to ref struct type incurs a heap allocation #70264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid taking a lock the vast majority of the time in GlobalOptionService.GetOption #70278
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ask for source generated state up front when getting the compile time solution #70205
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support cases where an array was assigned to a span type. #70287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesized list types should implement ICollection and IList #70288
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70286
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Avoid infinite cycle caused by an early binding of DefaultParameterValue attribute. #70242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Send batch events for DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #70039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Short-circuit tagger usage of interval tree when tagging complete snapshot #70285
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable recommender for `scoped` keyword #70290
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
